gobblin.compaction.mapreduce

Class MRCompactionTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.task.BaseAbstractTask
      • gobblin.runtime.mapreduce.MRTask
        • gobblin.compaction.mapreduce.MRCompactionTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskIFace, Runnable

    public class MRCompactionTask
extends MRTask
    Customized task of type MRTask, which runs MR job to compact dataset. The job creation is delegated to CompactionSuite.createJob(Dataset) After job is created, run() is invoked and after compaction is finished. a callback CompactionSuite.getCompactionCompleteActions() will be invoked

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class gobblin.runtime.mapreduce.MRTask

        MRTask.Events

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Below three steps are performed for a compaction task: Do verifications before a map-reduce job is launched. Start a map-reduce job and wait until it is finished Do post-actions after map-reduce job is finished
        Specified by:
        run in interface TaskIFace
        Specified by:
